abstract: A new dude-heavy hangout brings Blue Bottle coffee to the Lower East Side.
snippet: A new dude-heavy hangout brings Blue Bottle coffee to the Lower East Side.
lead_paragraph: A longtime resident of the Lower East Side, Michael Little had taken to riding his bike to Williamsburg, Brooklyn, for a decent cup of coffee. Specifically, a cup of Blue Bottle coffee, the San Francisco-based cult favorite. Fortunately for his neighbors, Little got tired of making the trek. In August, he and his friend Chad Eggers opened Lost Weekend NYC, a lifestyle shop and coffee bar that carries, in addition to Blue Bottle, a selection of men's T-shirts, hoodies and board shorts from the clothing label Saltbox and products by the grooming gurus Malin+Goetz. The cafe, housed in a light-drenched former gallery space on a burgeoning stretch of Orchard Street, is already attracting a (dude-heavy) crowd.
